code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatusPill=_ref=>{let{status}=_ref;const getStatusStyles=status=>{switch(status===null||status===void 0?void 0:status.toLowerCase()){case'completed':return'bg-green-100 text-green-800';case'running':return'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800';case'pending':return'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800';case'failed':return'bg-red-100 text-red-800';case'rolled_back':return'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800';default:return'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800';}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium ${getStatusStyles(status)}`,children:status});};export default StatusPill;
